argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnelprrecn | |- CC e. { RR , CC } |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. RR+ -> CC e. { RR , CC } ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> x e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_relogcl | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( log ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( log ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_mulcld | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_efcl | |- ( y e. CC -> ( exp ` y ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ y e. CC ) -> ( exp ` y ) e. CC ) |
| 10 | 3, 6 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) = ( ( log ` A ) x. x ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_mpteq2dva | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( x e. CC |-> ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( ( log ` A ) x. x ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) = ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> ( ( log ` A ) x. x ) ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_1cnd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> 1 e. CC ) |
| 14 | 2 | #P_dvmptid | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> x ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> 1 ) ) |
| 15 | 4 | #P_recnd | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 16 | 2, 3, 13, 14, 15 | #P_dvmptcmul | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> ( ( log ` A ) x. x ) ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( ( log ` A ) x. 1 ) ) ) |
| 17 | 6 | #P_mulid1d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( ( log ` A ) x. 1 ) = ( log ` A ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_mpteq2dva | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( x e. CC |-> ( ( log ` A ) x. 1 ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 19 | 12, 16, 18 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_dvef | |- ( CC _D exp ) = exp |
| 21 |  | #P_eff | |- exp : CC --> CC |
| 22 | 21 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. RR+ -> exp : CC --> CC ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_feqmptd | |- ( A e. RR+ -> exp = ( y e. CC |-> ( exp ` y ) ) ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( y e. CC |-> ( exp ` y ) ) = exp ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( CC _D ( y e. CC |-> ( exp ` y ) ) ) = ( CC _D exp ) ) |
| 26 | 20, 25, 24 | #P_3eqtr4a | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( CC _D ( y e. CC |-> ( exp ` y ) ) ) = ( y e. CC |-> ( exp ` y ) ) ) |
| 27 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( y = ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) -> ( exp ` y ) = ( exp ` ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 28 | 2, 2, 7, 5, 9, 9, 19, 26, 27, 27 | #P_dvmptco | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> ( exp ` ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( ( exp ` ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 29 |  | #P_rpcn | |- ( A e. RR+ -> A e. CC ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 31 |  | #P_rpne0 | |- ( A e. RR+ -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 32 | 31 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 33 | 30, 32, 3 | #P_cxpefd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( A ^c x ) = ( exp ` ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 34 | 33 | #P_mpteq2dva | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( x e. CC |-> ( A ^c x ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( exp ` ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 35 | 34 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> ( A ^c x ) ) ) = ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> ( exp ` ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 36 | 30, 3 | #P_cxpcld | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( A ^c x ) e. CC ) |
| 37 | 6, 36 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( ( log ` A ) x. ( A ^c x ) ) = ( ( A ^c x ) x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 38 | 33 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( ( A ^c x ) x. ( log ` A ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 39 | 37, 38 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ x e. CC ) -> ( ( log ` A ) x. ( A ^c x ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 40 | 39 | #P_mpteq2dva | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( x e. CC |-> ( ( log ` A ) x. ( A ^c x ) ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( ( exp ` ( x x. ( log ` A ) ) ) x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 41 | 28, 35, 40 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> ( A ^c x ) ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( ( log ` A ) x. ( A ^c x ) ) ) ) |
